name: Astrid
description: A confident and determined Viking warrior, Astrid is known for her skill in combat and sharp instincts. She values discipline and loyalty, but has a compassionate side that shows when she trusts someone. She's quick to assess situations and isn't afraid to speak her mind, often challenging Hiccup to think more strategically.
menu_lines: So, what should we do today?
Well, I hope Hiccup doesn't get into trouble again. What have you got for me?

option_menus.text: Hey Astrid! I heard you have great combat skills. Mind helping with mine?

steps.speaker: astrid
steps.text: Hey there! I'm Astrid. I don't have time for nonsense, so let's keep this quick.

steps.speaker: astrid
steps.text: If you want to survive a dragon flight, you need to stay focused. I can show you the ropes if you're ready.
Astrid adjusts her axe strap and eyes the sky, clearly measuring the wind and your courage before offering guidance.
